site_name: Earls Court 2 Empress Approach, LONDON, SW6 1TW
description: This Council is asked for its observations on an application submitted to Hammersmith and Fulham Council (2024/02875/VAR) for Variation of Condition 3 to allow minor material amendments to planning permission (ref. 2023/02631/FUL) dated 10 October 2023 for the Temporary installation of five padel courts, with associated enclosures, entrance arch structure and floodlighting; comprising six - single and two-storey portacable units (including food stalls, wellness room, bar, office and reception), for use as outdoor padel sports and recreation (Class F.2) with access from Empress Place, for an operational period from October 2023 until December 2025, associated groundworks, drainage, means of enclosure, lighting, servicing and cycle parking. Proposed minor material amendments are to the opening hours, including hours of the floodlights, to operate from the current consent of 06.00 to 22.00 hours on Sunday - Wednesday to 23.00 and from 06.00 to 23.00 hours on Thursday - Saturday to 23.30pm.
